item.title: Redundancy in Amazon EC2
item.description: Redundancy in AWS EC2 This article deals with redundancy in multi-AZ setup on EC2. Deal efficiently with AZs outages. Applicable to many others deployment styles. AWS is the branch of a company everybody knows. Amazon, not only selling books, DVDs and shoes has also one of the greatest numbers of virtualÂ servers to rent in the world. Some say that the name Cloud has been invented because of AWS. Their servers are located all around the world.
